OOC: Okay, as agreed, I am not going to dictate this battle=92s results, I =
am
just describing it to keep everything together. I wanted to see how this=
 one
would run. HOWEVER please keep in mind that it is difficult if not
imp=
ossible to talk on the radio, especially to give long speeches while in
the=
 middle of a hand to hand battle without receiving some sort of damage.

BI=
C:

*AT THE BATTLE!!!*

The battle near the black tower continues to rage o=
n! Tuscon attempting to
bring the full brunt of his Ninjabot training to th=
e fore! He is in the
battle of his life, trying to fend off Hydras, the lea=
der of the Predacon
forces, with only one good working arm, even as preciou=
s battery fluid
continues to leak from the wound in his shoulder. Hydras on=
 the other hand
looks to be fairly undamaged, his laughter echoing across t=
he battlefield as
he uses his many heads bite at Tuscon and spit fire!

As =
Tuscon attempts to communicate with the rest of his comrades, all he gets
i=
s for his trouble is the sound of feedback and noise. Above the battlefield=

Deepstryke in his massive gun mode is still watching over the battle and
e=
mitting his RF jamming beams, blocking all Maximal and Autobot radio
signal=
s in this battle!

Even as Tuscon is beginning to realize how dire his situ=
ation is, Iguanus,
the Predacon Demolitions and artillery expert locks his =
own incendiary
launcher on Tuscon, and with a smile pulls the trigger bring=
ing his own
formidable firepower down on the Maximal.

Inferno and Insectic=
on do much the same thing!

> Kup continue moving and firing against Phobia=
.

> [Straightshot] She quickly saw that Kup needed
> some help, and quickl=
y darts in, with a leap
> attack to attempt a rapid fire arrow assault on P=
hobia

Straightshot and Kup fire into the air, filling it with arrows! But =
Phobia
who had been clipped in the wing last time didn=92t try to swing in =
as close
on this run, giving her a few more seconds to out maneuver the slo=
wer ground
based Maximals.

She laughed, her shrill voice cutting through t=
he air, =93Is that all you have
Maximals?!?=94 She swung around, her own gu=
ns steaming in the cool air from
the workout she had been giving them. With=
 an agile wing-flip she brings
herself around for another run, however this=
 time it is not just machine
guns she brings to bear. With a click and a he=
avy clunking sound, rockets
that had been positioned beneath her wings deta=
ched and ignite as they began
travelling towards Kup=92s and Straight Shot=
=92s position!

Overhead several sweeps continue to fly, lending their fire=
power to the
general cacophony of the battle as Waspinator and Terrorsaur f=
ly in through
the smoke that is beginning to rise from the ground.

> Talon=
 jumped to aside and roll, it was a calculated move.
> Then she stood up an=
d aimed at Skyshadow's head and said
> "Bye, bye" and open fire

Skyshadow,=
 who had been watching Talon up to this point, managed to use his
left hand=
 to bat Talon=92s weapon aside, turning what may have been a death
dealing =
blast into one that just lanced into his shoulder.

=93You Fool!=94 He scre=
amed, his optics turning crimson in anger as smoke rose
from his left shoul=
der. "You can't win! We will just have to do this the
HARD WAY!" With his r=
ight hand, which was in actuality a large pincer like
claw, he attempted to=
 throttle Talon by the neck! =93Die Maximal!=94 he said,
his voice deep and=
 venomous.

The other Fuzors move up behind Talon. =93You would look like a=
 tasty morsel.=94
Quickstrike said in his strange wild-west accent, Buzzcla=
w, Terragator and
Injector just laughed evilly as they all surrounded him.
=

*OUTSIDE THE ARK*

> "Hey, I think I have another idea ta help that one al=
ong
> Rodimus. The shield around the ark, does that only work
> above groun=
d or underground too? Because if it doesn't
> work underground, I could bur=
row a tunnel beneath the ark,
> and come above ground near an alternative e=
ntrance, if it
> has one. With your scrambling devices, and my ability ta
>=
 dig under ground, we could get in without much of a fuss.
> Whoever's out =
there wouldn't even know we're on the move."
> I know how ta dig without ma=
king noise."
>
> Quickstride nodds.
>
> "Hey, and while he does that, I cou=
ld show myself, and
> create a distraction long enough for you guys ta get =
in.
> We're not the most brilliant of the maximals, but we know
> the basic=
s."

Ramulus glanced at Uproar and then down at his frame as if suspicious =
as to
how a bot designed to be a cat could actually be a good digger too. W=
ith a
slight shrug he turned to look at Rodimus.

=93Quickstride.=94 Rodimu=
s said, his voice intense but low =93If try this, you
will not be able to j=
oin us.=94 Rodimus looked down at the device in his hand
as he spoke, =93Th=
e window of opportunity to get in will be a few seconds at
most. You would =
have to be some distance from us in order for your ruse to
be effective.=94=


Leo II nodded, he was about to say something more when Rodimus held up hi=
s
hand for silence as he got a message from Perceptor . . .

> =93All my in=
ventions has self-destruction program can
> destroy the BlackFortress=94. C=
laims to be able to free
> up channels. And about Nightlight can download m=
y
> weapons energy to reboot her

Rodimus nodded, =93Good. Then I will aler=
t the others so that they can prepare
to evacuate. Give us about thirty sec=
onds!=94

He looked over at Quickstride and Uproar. =93We may not need your=
 distraction.
Perceptor says he can blow the Black Tower. I am sure that wh=
en that
happens, whatever Predacon inside will be distracted as he learns t=
hat his
base is gone.=94

*INSIDE THE ARK*

> Elita lower her body and hide=
 behind the pipers,
> she waited and watched

Footsteps could be heard appr=
oaching Elita, a light shuffling sound, almost
a stumbling sound, and then =
a grunt. The hall is dark, but dimly the shape
of something moving in the r=
oom with Elita can be dimly seen.


*INSIDE THE BLACK TOWER!!!*

As Rat Tra=
p fell over seemingly poisoned, the spider-like bots moved up to
him as if =
to examine him, small antenna like scanners extend from their
frame.

Howev=
er they are quickly distracted by Windlord and his continued movement
so th=
ey run on, leaving Rat Trap entirely alone for the moment.

=93Rat Trap!=94=
 Rodimus=92 voice came over the Maximal thief=92s radio. Rodimus=92
voice w=
as somewhat fuzzy, having to cut through the interference from the
battlefi=
eld, but fortunately Rat Trap was far enough away that he could
still hear =
him. =93I believe Tuscon said he was sending you inside the tower?
We have =
a plan to destroy it. Get out now! You have thirty seconds!=94

(TAG)

Pres=
ton

--90e6ba4fc23cfff323049b0343df
